author: jonesde
msg: A small change to address an issue reported by Angelo Matarazzo when HTTPS is disabled and form data is POSTed; note that deploying so that OFBiz doesn't know if the request is over HTTPS or not is NOT recommended as this DOES open a security vulnerability for XSRF and such when data is POSTed not over HTTPS
